ComicInfo.Characters: Lisa Elsten,Kuma,Wolf-Man,Jesus Christ,Ashley Guthrie,Kyle,Sistine Centuria,Cassie Hack,Vlad,Georgia Peaches,Firebreather,Chris Krank,Muffy Joworski,Pooch,Milk and Cheese
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:03:02 [Issue ID 4000-144426] urn:comicvine:4000-144426 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 07:08:46. [Issue ID 556333]
ComicInfo.Summary:
After seeing her father and mother (again!) die, Cassie Hack was stunned. Unable to help her, Vlad calls Georgia, one of Cassie's best friends. In the meantime in Indiana, Chris and Lisa receive a visit from Hell. A killer sent to take Pooch back to Hell and capture Cassie Hack for punishment.
Meanwhile, sad and alone, Vlad fought against some creatures that used to haunt Cassie's dreams but he couldn't talk this with Cassie who decided not only to quit her life as a slasher but to finally open up her heart and kiss Georgia.
Will Cassie and Vlad be able to have a normal life? What will happen with Lisa and Chris who are in the hands of this hellish creature? And what's the role of Ashley Guthrie in all this nightmare?
ComicInfo.Title: Closer, Part 1
